Moderation by Users

  • Created: October 8, 2014
  • / Author: admin

Each community has it’s own social codes and manners. Spot.IM gives your community members the tools to keep the conversation on your website at tune with their values. Users can repot a message or another user, after 4 reports the message will be automatically deleted or the user will be automatically kicked.

How is it done?

Hover over the a message that user wrote > Click the three dots icon > Choose Report Message or Report User

Select the reason for the report and save
